metadata.title: CVE-2021-39272 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: Fetchmail before 6.4.22 fails to enforce STARTTLS session encryption in some circumstances, such as a certain situation with IMAP and PREAUTH.

notes.note: sbeattie> when backporting, upstream is asking to make sure we update documentation covering the fixes as well mdeslaur> only an issue with IMAP PREAUTH sessions and STARTTLS. It is recommended to switch to implicit TLS

criterions.comment: fetchmail package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
